# allowsContinuousInteraction

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the page control allows continuous interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsContinuousInteraction: Bool { get set }
```

## Customizing the interaction state

- **interactionState**: The interaction state when the current page changes.
- **UIPageControl.InteractionState**: Constants that define the interaction states of the page control.
